scripts.build: bun run tsc -b tsconfig.app.json && bun x --bun vite build && bun run scripts/pruneVideos.ts
scripts.functions:dev: bun x wrangler pages dev dist --compatibility-date=2024-06-24 --port=8788
scripts.functions:deploy: bun x wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.dev:full: bun run build && bun run functions:dev
scripts.start: bun x concurrently "bun run dev" "bun run dev:api"
scripts.cap:init: bun x cap init FRC-7790 com.frc7790.app --web-dir=dist --npm-client=bun
scripts.android:build: bun run build && bun x cap copy android && bun x cap sync android
scripts.ios:build: bun run build && bun x cap copy ios && bun x cap sync ios
scripts.db:migrate: bun x wrangler d1 execute frc7790-com --file=migrations/001_initial_schema.sql
scripts.db:migrate:dev: bun x wrangler d1 execute frc7790-com-dev --file=migrations/001_initial_schema.sql
scripts.db:migrate:prod: bun x wrangler d1 execute frc7790-com --remote --file=migrations/001_initial_schema.sql
scripts.db:backup: bun x wrangler d1 export frc7790-com --output=backup.sql
scripts.deploy:prod: bun x wrangler pages deploy dist --env production
scripts.typecheck: bun run tsc -b tsconfig.app.json --noEmit && bun run tsc -b tsconfig.functions.json --noEmit
